a bare Ti-Beta zeolite), toward CH 4 as the prevalent species (60).In this way, the selectivity toward CO or CH 4 can be tuned by either using Pt or Pd.The TOF values obtained in this work outperform reported state-of-the-art values in similar research.The improved activity by adding the nanoparticles was attributed to an improved charge separation efficiency, together with a plasmonic contribution of the metal nanoparticles under the applied experimental conditions.
